title: Finding Maximum Value in Array
brief: Practice using loops to iterate over arrays and compare values.

exercise.title: maxValueInArray
exercise.instructions: Take an array of numbers as input and return the maximum value. Use a for loop or a method like Math.max() if available.

steps.label: Step 2: Iterate over array using for loop
Step 3: Compare current value with max and update if necessary
Step 4: Return maximum value after iterating over array

acceptance.prompt: Take an array of numbers as input and return the maximum value. Use a for loop or a method like Math.max() if available.
